headline: Did This PayPal News Just Send ARB Soaring?
summary: Arbitrum's token ARB surged in 24 hours, outperforming bitcoin and ether. This comes as speculation swirled that it may soon support PayPal's stablecoin PYUSD. CoinDesk’s Jennifer Sanasie breaks it down on “Chart of the Day,” brought to you by crypto.com.

headline: Roadzen Named Leading Insurtech Company on CNBC’s 2025 World’s Top Fintech Companies List
summary: NEW YORK, July 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Roadzen Inc. (Nasdaq: RDZN) (“Roadzen” or the “Company”), a global leader in AI at the intersection of insurance and mobility, announced today that it has been recognized as the leading company in the Insurtech category of CNBC and Statista’s 2025 list of the World’s Top Fintech Companies — a recognition that underscores Roadzen’s pioneering role in transforming insurance through artificial intelligence and advanced data science. The Insurtech segment
